code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import Error from"../components/Error";import{deletePizza,getAllPizzas}from"../actions/pizzaActions";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function PizzasList(){const dispatch=useDispatch();const pizzasstate=useSelector(state=>state.getAllPizzasReducer);const{pizzas,error}=pizzasstate;useEffect(()=>{dispatch(getAllPizzas());},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Pizzas List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"table-responsive",children:[error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Error,{error:"Something went wrong"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table table-bordered",style:{borderColor:"#343a40"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{className:"table-dark",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:{minWidth:"150px"},children:"Prices"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Category"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Actions"})]})}),pizzas&&pizzas.map(pizza=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:pizza.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:["Small : ",pizza.prices[0]["small"],/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"Medium : ",pizza.prices[0]["medium"],/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"Large : ",pizza.prices[0]["large"]]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:pizza.category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-trash m1",onClick:()=>{dispatch(deletePizza(pizza._id));}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admin/editpizza/".concat(pizza._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-edit m1"})})]})]});})]})]})]});}
